text:
@GOP @realDonaldTrump's LACK of LEADERSHIP & BOTCHED response to #COVID19 have resulted in 150 THOUSAND DEATHS; Affected 150 THOUSAND families. #Trump took MONTHS & MONTHS to adopt the basics. UNFIT. He thrives on putting people at risk. #Hydroxychloroquine 
#RepublicansAgainstTrump

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
